ComicInfo.Characters: Krennick,Rusty Noble,Gaia Noble,Liz Donnelly,Zephyr Noble,Frost,Celeste Noble,Doc Noble
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:29:34 [Issue ID 4000-131185] urn:comicvine:4000-131185 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 10:06:37. [Issue ID 116703]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Ian Richardson,Matt Wendt,Jim Valentino,Michael Avon Oeming
ComicInfo.Summary: Following Liz's public relations faux pas, Gaia scrambles to do some quick spin control, while Rusty tries to find the source of the information leak ... with his fists. Meanwhile, Doc lets his guard down in front of Liz, and Frost gets some leverage to use against Gaia in his quest to learn who his father is. Newcomer Matt Wendt pencils the back-up story, which chronicles Krennick's infatuation with Zephyr.
ComicInfo.Title: Family Secrets, Part Two; Unrequited
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Brett Evans,James Brown (J. Brown),Jim Valentino,Michael Avon Oeming,Ray Dillon
